definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: The preparation of uniform UHMWPE solution is the chief task of gel-spinning.
sentences.chinese: 製備均勻的UHMWPE溶液是凍膠紡絲的首要任務。

sentences.english: A chemical used to reduce the viscosity of specialized treatment fluids such as gels and foams.
sentences.chinese: 用於降低凍膠和泡沫等專用處理液粘度的化學劑。

sentences.english: The higher shear rate, the earlier reduction of strength of gel.
sentences.chinese: 剪切速率愈大，發生凍膠強度下降的時間愈早。
